title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is redrawn N times, resulting in inefficient redraw behavior.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Enable word wrap mode in StyledText.
3. Append N lines to the StyledText.
4. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times.
